item.title: How to Format Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Copy an Object: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut With Menu How to Paste an Object: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Change the Color of a Shape How to Change the Border Color of a Shape How to Change the Color of a Sticky Note No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: See a video tutorial: How to Copy an Object With Click Step 1: First select an object.
